content:
ENGLISH 义务教育教科书三年级上册义务教育教科书英 语三年级上册 （一年级起点） （一年级起点） 英语 产品绿色印刷产品定价：4.90 元全国价格举报电话：12315 
[中国] 河北 教育 出版 社 [加拿大] DC加拿大国际交流中心合作编写 ENGLISH 义务教育教科书英语三年级上册 （一年级起点） 
亲爱的同学们，欢迎你们进入三年级！ 学习英语两年了，你们已经能用英语互相问候，能说出多种颜色和数字， 能简单介绍自己、家人及朋友，还学习了英语字母。 这学期丹尼、詹妮和李明会带领你们学习有关学校物品、食物、家庭以及身体部位等内容。 你们想用英语描述简单的学校活动吗？ 你们想知道怎样用英语表达对食物的喜好吗？ 你们想学会用英语介绍自己的家人吗？ 你们想知道怎样用英语描述自己或同学吗？那就开始这学期的学习吧！ 请你们在学习中多听、敢说、善于模仿，做到积极参与，大胆练习，遇到困难不害怕， 出现错误不害羞。 这样你们一定会体会到英语学习有趣且容易！ 同学们，上学期的英语学习主要以听说为主，从这学期开始，你们将会学习一些认读词汇的方法，这样你们会感到识记单词很容易！相信你们一定会学得很棒！ 致同 学 
CONTENTS Unit 1 We Like School! ··················1 Unit 2 My Favourite Food ············17 Unit 3 I Love My Family ···············33 Unit 4 Look at Me ························49 Word List ··········································65 Vocabulary ·······································68 1 UNIT 1 Lessons 1~6 We Like School!

content: 44 Lesson 18 Stick Together Story time There is a family with a father and three sons. The sons don’t like to work together. The father is very old and sick now. He wants to teach his sons a good lesson. He calls his sons together in his room. “Bring me some sticks,” the old man says. Then, he gives the sticks to his sons. “Break the sticks!” he says. One by one, they try and try, but they can’t break the sticks at all. 1 2 3 45 Then the old man says, “Take one of the sticks and break it.” The stick breaks very easily. The old father looks at his sons. “Do you see, my sons? Stick together, and you will be strong,” he says. The three brothers understand. Now they love and help each other. They live happily together. Think About It What does the father give his sons? What lesson do the sons learn? stick together 团结 sick 生病的 bring 拿来 stick 枝条 break 折断 strong 强壮的 understand 懂，理解 each other 彼此 4 5 6

content: 57 1. Memory Game. 2. Read and point. My name is Lily. I am tall. I have long black hair. I wear a yellow T-shirt and a blue skirt. Can you find me in the picture? My cousin Eddy is young. He has short brown hair. He likes to play ping-pong. Can you find Eddy in the picture? 3 Let’s do it! I have black eyes. My hair is long and black. I have blue eyes. My hair is short and yellow. She has black eyes. Her hair is long and black. 58 1 Long or short? Big or small? Lesson 23 Long and Short I have short arms and long legs. I have small ears and big feet. I have long arms and short legs. I have big ears and small feet. I’m tall. I’m yellow and brown. I have long ears and a short tail. My eyes are red. I have big eyes. I’m black and white. 1 2 2 Let’s play!

content: 59 It’s purple. It has six legs, three yellow eyes and two arms. Make and say. Letters and sounds 4 c ook c olour c ousin do c tor oo c f oo t l oo k g oo d b oo k f oo d sch oo l c oo l n oo dles How much food could a good cook cook? Try to read Tongue Twister 3 Let’s do it! 60 Lesson 24 We Look Different Hello! My name is Mary. What’s your name ? Thank you. What colour is your hair ? My name is Danny. I like your red hair. Look at me! My eyes are black. I have two hands, too. My hands are green. I have two hands. 1 3 2 4 Story time My hair is black. My eyes are blue.

content: 61 I feel happy. I have two legs. I walk to school. I have a tail. Wow, that’s cool! I feel happy, too. Me, too. 5 7 6 8 Look! I have eight fi ngers. I have ten fi ngers. Wow! Think About It We are different. But we’re friends. What does Danny look like? What does Mary look like? different 不同的 fi nger 手指 tail 尾巴 62 Unit 4 Review My hair is brown. My eyes are blue. My arms are yellow. My nose is red. My hands are orange. Listen and circle Read and colour 1 2 1 2 63 Look and write Read and match 3 4 Close your left eye. Close your right eye. Put your fingers on your ears. Put your hands on your head. I am yellow and brown. I am white. My eyes are red. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 1. This is her _________. 2. This is her _________. 3. This is her _________. 4. This is her _________. 5. This is his _________. 6. This is his _________. 7. This is his _________.
